DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim clinical trial evaluate pharmacokinetic safety profile NN1250 ( insulin degludec ) alter extent dose adjust subject impair liver function compare dose subject normal liver function .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigating Pharmacokinetic ( Mode Action Body ) Safety Profiles NN1250 ( Insulin Degludec ) Subjects With Various Degrees Impaired Liver Function Subjects With Normal Liver Function
DOC.criteria: Subject normal hepatic function , liver parameter within normal range . Not assess ChildPugh criterion . Or : Subject stable hepatic impairment classify ChildPugh grade A , B C assess Investigator Body mass index maximum 40.0 kg/m^2 Subject disease condition Investigator feel would interfere trial outcome execution except condition associate hepatic impairment group subject compromise hepatic function Subject donate blood plasma past month 500 mL within 3 month prior screen Not able willing refrain smoking inpatient period
